name: The Dice Game Show
description:
The game dosnt wor on itch.io so go play it here https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/714874973/

A game made in 48h for the GMTK game jam.

It's a game in wich you chose the winners of the dice game show.

Instructions: At the start of each round you will get information about the contestents. Based on there info you choose who will win by clicking the dice (you click on dice untill you got your desired number)
